title.tokPisin: Gris Bilong God Long Olgeta Taim

scripture.tokPisin: Mipela i kisim bel isi long God long bilip bilong Jisas Krais.
scripture.english: We have peace with God through faith in Jesus Christ.

devotionalText.tokPisin: God i save givim bel isi long yumi long olgeta taim. Em i stap wantaim yumi long olgeta samting.
devotionalText.english: God gives us peace in every season. He walks with us through all things.

title.tokPisin: Redi Long Bihainim Tok Bilong God

scripture.tokPisin: God i save givim rot long yumi long bihainim tok bilong em.
scripture.english: The Lord prepares a way for us to keep His commandments.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Yumi ken bilip long plan bilong God long laip bilong yumi.
devotionalText.english: We can trust God's plan for our lives.

scripture.tokPisin: God i ken brukim yumi long ol samting bilong yumi, tasol em i ken mekim yumi strong moa.
scripture.english: God can take away our weaknesses and make us stronger.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Oltaim God i stap wantaim yumi long taim bilong traim.
devotionalText.english: God is always with us in times of trial.

scripture.tokPisin: Taim yumi helpim ol narapela, yumi helpim God.
scripture.english: When we serve others, we are serving God.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Yumi ken kisim amamas taim yumi helpim ol narapela.
devotionalText.english: We can find joy in helping others.

scripture.tokPisin: Sapos yu gat bilip olsem liklik graun, yu inap tokim maunten long go long ples bilong em.
scripture.english: If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can move mountains.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Bilip i strongpela samting long laip bilong yumi.
devotionalText.english: Faith is a powerful thing in our lives.

title.tokPisin: Hope i Stap Long Rot Bilong Yumi

scripture.tokPisin: Yumi mas wokabaut wantaim bilip na hop long Krais.
scripture.english: Wherefore, ye must press forward with a steadfastness in Christ, having a perfect brightness of hope.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Taim yumi wokabaut wantaim bilip, God bai i givim yumi strong long go het.
devotionalText.english: As we walk in faith, God gives us strength to move forward.

scripture.tokPisin: Man i bilip long Krais bai i no sem.
scripture.english: Anyone who believes in Him will never be put to shame.

devotionalText.tokPisin: Bilip long Jisas i mekim yumi stap strong na no ken pret.
devotionalText.english: Believing in Jesus makes us strong and unafraid.

title.tokPisin: God i Harim Kraia Bilong Yumi

scripture.tokPisin: Ai bilong God i lukim ol stretpela man na em i harim krai bilong ol.
scripture.english: The eyes of the Lord are on the righteous and His ears are attentive to their cry.

devotionalText.tokPisin: God i harim taim yumi singaut long em. Em i stap klostu long bel bilong yumi.
devotionalText.english: God hears us when we call. He is close to our hearts.
